footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Cyno | Update Date: 08/26/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery OR ATK % |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate OR DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge ( ~140% ER )|CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery|ATK %

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Burst 
**2)** Skill
Auto Attacks do __NOT__ need to be levelled as his Electro-infused Normal and Charged attacks during his Burst status. These attacks in his Burst have a different set of multipliers based on his __Burst talent level__. Despite scaling off of Burst talent, the attacks dealt are not Burst DMG but instead NA/ CA DMG.
